mapper.select: SELECT STUD_NO , KOR_NAME , STUD_UNIV , STUD_DEPARTMENT , STUD_MAJOR , STUD_STATUS FROM STUDENT JOIN USERS ON(STUD_NO = USER_NO) WHERE STUD_STATUS != 4 ORDER BY STUD_NO DESC
SELECT DISTINCT STUD_DEPARTMENT FROM STUDENT WHERE STUD_UNIV = #{studUniv}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT ( STUD_NO , PROF_NO , STUD_UNIV , STUD_DEPARTMENT , STUD_MAJOR , STUD_MINOR , STUD_INTO , STUD_GRAD ) VALUES ( (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) || SEQ_STUDENT.CURRVAL , NULL , #{studUniv} , #{studDepartment} , #{studMajor} , NULL , (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')) || '.03.02' , NULL )
